Benefits:


  • True 100% Uptime
We can migrate your server between physical hosts with zero downtime and impact.

  • Daily Snapshots
Snapshots are a point in time backup that takes seconds and has no impact on you server’s performance.

  • Web Self Service Portal
Get the control you deserve with your own easy to manage control panel that gives you every tool needed to manage you virtual server with ease.

  • Rapid Provisioning
As we don’t have to build and maintain physical servers your virtual server can be provisioned in a matter of minutes from any template of your choice.

  • Power saving
We care about the environment and so should you. Simply ditch that dedicated server that sits there consuming unnecessary power and we will migrate you over to our platform completely free of charge.
